synopsis.text: Fullmoon's young songstress, Mitsuki, finds herself in a bind after an untimely oversleep causes her to rush out for a crucial TV appearance, accidentally leaving behind her companions, Takuto and Meroko. Without their presence, she's unable to transform into her alter ego, Fullmoon. Meanwhile, Takuto and Meroko embark on a challenging journey in their plushie animal forms to reach Mitsuki. Facing various obstacles along the way, the duo must find a way to reunite with Mitsuki and enable her transformation before the interview commences. Will they succeed in time, or will Mitsuki's performance be left in the shadows? This delightful side story from the "Full Moon" series promises a thrilling adventure filled with laughter, friendship, and the power of music.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
